card_name: Maha Vailo, Light of the Heavens
card_text: This card gains the following effect(s), based on the number of Equip Cards equipped to it.$N●1+: Gains 1000 ATK for each Equip Card equipped to it.$N●2+: Your opponent cannot activate monster effects during the Battle Phase.$N●3+: When your opponent's card or effect is activated that targets this card (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Equip Card you control to the GY; negate that effect.$N●4+: Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects during the Battle Phase.$N●5+: Any battle damage this card inflicts to your opponent is doubled.
